column4: Traffic;Siem Reap:------ At 7:00 pm on October 4
column6: there was an accident involving two Thais riding on a motorbike. The bike hit a Khmer cow machine in Srey Snom District
column8: the two victims were taken to hospital in Thailand. The motorbike and the tractor were taken by police for legal proceedings.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/377381
